sources.title: 1933 Gruß Und Kuß Veronika ( Paul Hörbiger, Hilde Hildebrand, Otto Walburg)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1933. Gruß und Kuss,Veronika  u.a mit Paul Hörbiger und Hilde Hildebrand.

metadata.Plot: Veronika, employed in a flower shop, has the habit of leaving flowers with a note -"Gruss und Kuss, Veronika (greetings and a kiss, Veronika)" to a special client she has fancied about. But he has the habit of sending flowers to an array of women. This puts her into action to prevent it, causing misunderstandings that will later have to be solved -somehow.
metadata.Actors: Franciska Gaal, Paul Hörbiger, Otto Wallburg
